headerDisplay: Homebridge module for the Philips TV (with JointSpace enabled) and ready for 2016 models
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [README](https://github.com/skrollme/homebridge-philipstv-x#readme) file.

poll_status_interval.title: Polling Interval
poll_status_interval.description: Time in seconds between status polls of the TV. Default is 30 seconds.

model_year.title: TV's Model Year
model_year.description: Model year of the TV. This is used to determine the correct API version to use. Default is 2014.

has_ambilight.title: Ambilight Support
has_ambilight.description: Wether the TV supports Ambilight. If set to false, Ambilight controls will not be available.

wol_url.title: WOL address
wol_url.description: Network address to send Wake-on-LAN packets to.

username.title: Username
username.description: Please see the Readme to find out, how to generate these credentials: https://github.com/skrollme/homebridge-philipstv-x?tab=readme-ov-file#credentials-for-2016-models
